instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 no charge
threads.message: Hi Guys, I have a macbook air that shows charging but its not. Under "about this mac" it says charging "no". Also no light on the charge plug. I do have all voltages as the mac is running, PPBUS 8.59 and 3.42 as well, also on the I/O board. Any idea where to start?

threads.title: 820-00165 no charge
threads.message: Have you tried another I/O cable and board???

threads.title: 820-00165 no charge
threads.message: Thanks man, got an orange light now after changing the I/O board, so will assemble and hope it charges now, will report back :)

threads.title: 820-00165 no charge
threads.message: The ornage light is back, but it still shows no charge under "about this mac", have tried with a new working battery.

threads.title: 820-00165 no charge
threads.message: Check the usual resistance between 17/18 27/28 on the ISL.
